# **Educational Services for Nova Institution**

## **Tender Information**

* **Solicitation Number:** 21208-24-4441675/A
* **Reference Number** : cb-788-71672012
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 1, 2024, at 13:00:00
* **Publication Date:** February 29, 2024
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

## **Objective**

This notice invites bids from qualified suppliers to provide educational services to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) at Nova Institution.

## **Scope of Work**

* **Duration:** January 1, 2025 to December 31, 2025, with the option to renew for two additional one-year periods.
* **Deliverables:**
	+ Adult Basic Education program (ABE)
	+ Adapted ABE programs
	+ Educational programs leading to the Adult High School Diploma
	+ Other education programs, pilot programs, digital education, and any other curriculum requested by the project authority
* **Staffing:** Three teachers/instructors, including:
	+ Two full-time teachers/instructors (35 hours/week)
	+ One part-time teacher/instructor (17.5 hours/week)
	+ Bilingual and qualified to teach all levels in both official languages

## **Requirements and Conditions**

* **Security Requirements:** This contract includes security requirements.
* **Eligibility:** Only suppliers who meet the qualifications outlined in the RFP may submit a bid.
* **Language:** Suppliers may submit their bid in either English or French.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** The evaluation will be based on the technical merit and price of the bid.

## **Contact Information**

* **Contracting Authority:** Jolaine Amos, (506) 269-3787, jolaine.amos@csc-scc.gc.ca

## **Procurement Process**

* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Notice URL:** None
* **Attachments:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33160/21208-24-4441675a---rfp
